issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: We use kryo as default serializer and javaXML based serialization is not used in many places and is also not well tested. We should remove javaXML serialization and make kryo as the only serialization option.

comments.body: I will start this after HIVE-12302
[~ashutoshc]/[~sershe] Can someone please review this patch?
its better to target this for 2.0 since in general you want to keep 2.1 compatible as much as possible with 2.0

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12776438/HIVE-12609.1.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12776719 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
selectDistinctStar.q is unrelated to this patch. I tested it even without this patch it still produces diff. Filed HIVE-12657 for it. Other test failures are unrelated.
Committed to master and cherrypicked to branch-2.0

Doc note:  This removes *hive.plan.serialization.format* from HiveConf.java in 2.0.0, so the wiki needs to be updated.

* [Configuration Properties -- hive.plan.serialization.format | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.plan.serialization.format]

sorry to ping an resolved JIRA, but can someone update the [official wiki|https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.plan.serialization.format] about this change? it's a bit misleading for user that property key [hive.plan.serialization.format |https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.plan.serialization.format]`considered` as existed
